byline.original: By MICHAEL GONCHAR and KATHERINE SCHULTEN

abstract: Do you see the Constitution as a living document that evolves with societal changes, or do you believe what the framers intended is what matters most?

headline.main: 6 Q’s About the News | Supreme Court Ruling Makes Same-Sex Marriage a Right Nationwide

snippet: Do you see the Constitution as a living document that evolves with societal changes, or do you believe what the framers intended is what matters most?
